SEARCH
Module SC2002FOMS

Package Controllers

package Controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    AdminController extends the functionalities of EmployeeController to provide administrative actions that can be performed by admin users.
    AuthController
    AuthController handles the authentication processes for users of the FOMS system.
    CustomerController
    CustomerController manages the customer interactions with branches, allowing them to select a branch, place orders, check the status of orders, and collect orders.
    EmployeeController
    EmployeeController serves as a base class for all employee types within the system.
    ManagerController
    ManagerController extends StaffController to provide managerial specific actions such as processing and viewing orders, managing the menu, and viewing staff information.
    StaffController
    StaffController extends the EmployeeController to provide general staff-related actions like displaying new orders, processing orders, and changing passwords.
